feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 08:48 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
